name: Diesel Mechs - Demo
description:
The game works best with a game controller. Press start button to see the controllers. If you only have access to keyboard and mouse. Then the controllers are:

WASD  - left joystick

Mouse movement/Arrows - right joystick

Q - activate mech movement (WASD, mouse movement)

E - activate crane movement (WASD, mouse movement)

Left mouse button/Ctrl - open grip

Right mouse button/Space - close grip

Y - change camera angle

ESC - open start menu. navigate with arrows, and click enter to press buttons

The goal is to gather christmas presents and other valuable objects into the larger mechs basket that is on the ground.

For more updates. Please follow me on instagram

https://www.instagram.com/dieselmechs/?hl=en
